description:
nova.network.api should catch DBError and throw APIError
https://github.com/openstack/nova/blob/stable/diablo/nova/network/api.py#L35

also affects.
- get_floating_ip_by_ip
- list_floating_ips
- release_floating_ip
- associate_floating_ip
- disassociate_floating_ip
title: nova.network.api should catch DBError
